public ref class SelectedDatesCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type SelectedDatesCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的选定日期。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects that represent the selected dates in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以编程方式管理 对象的集合，这些对象表示控件中的选定日期 。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the selected dates in a control. 此类通常用于在集合中添加或删除日期。This class is commonly used to add or remove dates from the collection. 此集合仅存储整个日期。This collection stores only whole dates. 删除每个的时间部分 。The time portion of each is removed. 日期按升序存储。The dates are stored in ascending order. 如果有重复日期，则集合中只存储一个日期。If there are duplicate dates, only one date is stored in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用 类在控件中选择日期 。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically use the class to select dates in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An -implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个实现了的 对象，该对象可以轻松地循环访问以获取集合中的每个项 。Use this method to create an -implemented object that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the collection. 使用 属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用 方法可将枚举数移回初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 需要在创建实现的对象之后调用该方法， 或使用方法将 枚举数移到集合中的第一项。The method needs to be called after creating an -implemented object or using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法创建一个实现了的 对象，该对象将循环访问以显示控件中的选定日期 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an -implemented object that is iterated through to display the selected dates from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
